data.lyric:
[ti:Internet (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Internet (Explicit) - Post Malone
[00:02.21]A-yeah-yeah-yeah
[00:04.46]Ohh
[00:05.43]Whoa-oh-oh
[00:08.71]A-yeah-yeah-yeah
[00:12.98]I just seen lil' mama Instagram and she flexin'
[00:15.90]Don't care about your puppies
[00:17.50]Just that a*s and them breastses
[00:19.46]Oh girl you a model d**n I never woulda guessed it
[00:22.44]And if you tryna throw out all them vibes I'ma catch 'em
[00:25.82]The lifestyle we live is just too dangerous
[00:27.60]Paranoid since they've been leakin' my s**t
[00:29.25]Wonder if it'll come out on the web
[00:30.67]And I can't help all these b***hes on my d**k
[00:32.45]Takin' a photo and postin' that s**t
[00:34.05]Comin' home late and I crawl into bed
[00:35.51]She always be askin' me "Where have you been"
[00:37.51]Whoa
[00:38.72]The world has gone to s**t and we all know that
[00:42.18]People freakin' out like hit the Prozac
[00:45.15]Leon DeChino shorts got all the blogs mad
[00:48.48]Well f**k the internet and you can quote that whoa
[00:52.68]It's a lot
[00:54.74]Well if ignorance is bliss then don't wake me up
[00:58.04]And I'll prolly be the last to know
[01:00.94]Whoa
[01:01.22]'Cause I don't get on the internet no more
[01:05.77]It's a lot
[01:07.76]Well if ignorance is bliss then don't wake me up
[01:10.98]And I'll prolly be the last to know
[01:13.47]Whoa
[01:14.27]'Cause I don't get on the internet no more
[01:19.87]Ooh-ooh
[01:26.06]Ooh-ooh
[01:32.46]Ooh-ooh
data.trans:
[ti:Internet (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.21]//
[00:04.46]//
[00:05.43]//
[00:08.71]//
[00:12.98]我刚刚看了我喜欢的妹子发的朋友圈 她在炫耀
[00:15.90]我对你的宠物不感兴趣
[00:17.50]你姣好的身材让我眼前一亮
[00:19.46]女孩 你是个模特吗 真是出乎我的意料
[00:22.44]如果你想摆脱那些负面情绪 我可以帮你
[00:25.82]我们的生活真是危机四伏
[00:27.60]我现在很多疑 因为有人一直泄露我的歌
[00:29.25]想知道他们会不会发布到网上
[00:30.67]妹子主动和我缠绵 我无法拒绝
[00:32.45]拍张照片 发到网上
[00:34.05]深夜时分回到家里 我爬进被窝里
[00:35.51]她总是问我 你去了哪里
[00:37.51]//
[00:38.72]这个世界糟糕透顶 我们都已知晓
[00:42.18]人们都精神失常 依赖药物
[00:45.15]Leon DeChino的短裤让所有的自媒体都疯了
[00:48.48]臭名昭著的互联网 你可以引用这句话
[00:52.68]一见定终身
[00:54.74]如果无知是上天的恩赐 那就别唤醒我
[00:58.04]我可能是最后一个知道的
[01:00.94]//
[01:01.22]因为我不再上网了
[01:05.77]一见定终身
[01:07.76]如果无知是上天的恩赐 那就别唤醒我
[01:10.98]我可能是最后一个知道的
[01:13.47]//
[01:14.27]因为我不再上网了
[01:19.87]//
[01:26.06]//
[01:32.46]//
